column4: Beechwood Re says exposure to hedge fund manager Platinum minimal
column5: NEW YORK  Aug 15 Reinsurer Beechwood Re said in a statement Monday that it was in the process of severing ties to Platinum Partners and that debt linked to the hedge fund manager and its holdings were small.
